Text: Julian is in a prison cell 23h/day. He's been in these conditions since the #COVID19 lockdown started in March. No visitors for 10 weeks. The prison is not easing restrictions. A radio is a window into the world.

Think #racism #discrimination just happen in USA and not in the UK? Wrong...we gave our share of problems too. Time to stop pretending we live an equal society #RacismIsAPublicHealthCrisis https://t.co/bWHPnGMG0T

12 doctors in GP have died from Covid1911 were BAMEAs we grieve for another of our colleagues, the promised report on the disproportionate impact on the virus on BAME is being witheld - is there something to hide? https://t.co/vN1foclPlx
In case anyone needs reminding of how deeply Trump loves the bible, here's him worming out of not knowing one single verse from it. https://t.co/hzrnetrLEL

It's heartening to inform that #COVID19 testing has started at Medical Colleges of Balasore and Baripada, with the respective collectors inaugurating the facilities. They will help in conducting more number of tests with prompt reports. Wish all the very best to both the teams.
Dave Batista calls Jaxson Ryker of The Forgotten Sons a "sorry ass motherfucker" for supporting Donald Trump https://t.co/uxbgFtYRGH #WWE https://t.co/gTcNT2QOeg
Trump will use any means available to remain in power for life or until he can hand over to Ivanka. He will use the present crisis to that end. American democracy is now in grave danger.
